Name: Puppy Adventure
About the game: A brave puppy, being a knight of the kingdom, is obliged to cleanse the royal lands of all evil spirits. In his new adventures, he will gain a long-lost sword and a ring that bestows agility on its owner. Will our knight be able to destroy the forces of evil and collect pieces of a mysterious puzzle? Puppy Adventure - Top Down View game with role-playing elements and finding puzzles, you in the role of a knight clear the locations of opponents and move through the intricate forests of the kingdom in order to find all the pieces of the puzzle and put them together. Features of the game: - Complexity - Beautiful Visual - Music - Search for puzzles
